body.name: INPHIC Wireless Mouse 700mAh Large Ergonomic Rechargeable 2.4G Optical PC Laptop Cordless Mice with USB Nano Receiver, for Windows Computer Office, Black

features: 🔋 Rechargeable Wireless Mouse: Built-in 700mAh high quality rechargeable battery means you can recharge whenever you want. When you leave your mouse more than 5 minutes, it will automatically get into sleep mode which saves electricity of the mouse, and click any button for waking up the mouse again (P.S. Please recharge for 1 hour when the mouse is new before use).

🔇 Silent Click(left and right button): Silent clicking laptop mouse for left and right button fits the circumstance for using the mouse in public, such as library, dormitory, office and so on, and apart from blue light indication during recharging and light off after full recharge, this design results worry-free for disturbing others
💯 2.4GHz Nano USB Mouse: Stable connection up to 10-meter working distance and just simply insert the nano USB and play; 3 adjustable DPI (1000/1200/1600) for freely controlling mouse speed

👏 6 High Efficient Buttons: There are not only clickless left and right buttons, but also a DPI adjusting button, scroll wheel and two side buttons(not silent). The function of the side buttons is to help you to back or forward when you browse a website, a USB mouse with side buttons is more convenient for you surfing and working

🤞 1-Year Warranty & Wide Compatibility: This wireless mouse is compatible with Windows 7/8/10/XP, Vista and Mac OS system and under the following warranty policy, 45-day unconditional refund and 12 months repairing warranty

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and response
reviews.reviewText: recently had the pleasure of using for an extended period, and I must say it has left a lasting impression with its exceptional performance and thoughtful design. As someone who spends long hours working and gaming on a computer, a reliable and comfortable mouse is crucial, and the [Model] delivers on both fronts.The [Model] boasts a high-precision sensor that translates to incredibly accurate and responsive tracking. Whether navigating intricate design projects or engaging in fast-paced gaming sessions, the mouse's performance has consistently impressed me. The customizable DPI settings further enhance the versatility, allowing for seamless transitions between tasks with a swift adjustment.Comfort is key during extended computer use, and the [Model] excels in this department. The mouse is well-contoured, providing a comfortable grip for both palm and claw users. The textured rubberized sides not only add a premium feel but also prevent slippage during intense moments. My only minor gripe is that individuals with larger hands may find it slightly on the smaller side, but this is subjective and doesn't detract significantly from the overall experience.The [Mouse Brand] software allows for a high degree of customization. Users can remap buttons, adjust RGB lighting, and create multiple profiles to suit different applications or games. The interface is intuitive, making it easy for both casual users and those who prefer fine-tuning every aspect of their mouse settings.Constructed with high-quality materials, the [Model] feels robust and durable. The buttons have a satisfying click, and after weeks of heavy use, they still respond as if brand new. The braided cable adds an extra layer of durability, minimizing the risk of fraying or wear over time.The [Model] includes additional features such as a customizable RGB lighting system that adds a touch of personalization. The inclusion of programmable buttons is appreciated, though some users may find the button placement less intuitive based on personal preferences.In conclusion, the [Mouse Brand] [Model] stands out as a high-performance and well-designed mouse. Its accuracy, comfort, and customization options make it an excellent choice for a variety of users, from professionals to gamers. While there might be minor quibbles with size preferences and button placement, the overall experience of using the [Model] is outstanding. If you're in the market for a reliable and versatile mouse, the [Mouse Brand] [Model] is a solid investment that won't disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Mouse Ive Ever Had, Its 13$
reviews.reviewText: This genuinely has to be the best budget mouse out there, and there's no way you can try and argue it. for 13$, you get incredible battery life, auto sleep mode to save battery, usb-c charging, great ergonomics, good dpi, side buttons AND its wireless. If you wanna get a starter mouse, this thing is unbelievably good. 11/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great over all mouse, just too large for travel. (For me)
reviews.reviewText: Great mouse.PROS:It’s lightweight and smooth moving.Very good wireless range and response speed for gaming.It fits my large hands well, good ergonomics, built in battery and USB-C charging A +. Easy access and storage for USB receiver A++The clicking is indeed silent and the feel of the button is a matte soft feel vs. a typical smooth plastic, I like the matte feel. A+++CONS:I’m returning though. The look does not match what I received.The front points out for no reason but cool looks.The base is just wider than it needs to be. Not good for travel as I need 2 for my line of work and I travel a lot with my gear.Durability is not great. Feels cheap. I’d pay a few $ more for something built better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth, fits the hand well and is responsive.
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the nicest mice I have ever used; it is smooth in operation and fits my hand very nicely (I like the little thumb rest). I picked the white and blue one because I liked the look of it and my desk is dark and sometimes when there wasn't much light I would have to hunt for my old mouse (it was almost black) this one stands out and is easy to see. I've just had it for a few days, so I can't say how long the battery will last. It came fully charged. I'm considering buying another one for my laptop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good looking mouse
reviews.reviewText: At first bought this mouse just for the looks, it was also very cheap compared to other similar options, but honestly I'm a little impressed.The build feels a little cheap, especially on the buttons for DPI and the sides, but that's minor considering the price and the goodies, the things that stud out for me was the buttons, they are very smooth and silent, after a long time with some logitech's standard clicky mouses now I love this feel.Battery is rechargeable, big plus for me, also has a light indicator on top to know when to charge.The design is very confortable, the thumb rest really makes a diference.I bought it just to match my desktop theme and now I'm using this mouse everyday and thinking about buying another one for the office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible mouse for an incredible price.
reviews.reviewText: I'e been using this mouse for the past month, it has replaced a Logitech one, believe there's nothing to miss from my previous mouse. This one is fully ergonomic, life battery is insane, I haven't charged it since I started using it. The noiseless clicks work as expected. I have to say it was such a nice purchase, that I'm getting myself a second one to use when I'm traveling. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Had this mouse for a week now and I’ve experienced the glitch where it stops working, but it’s easy fix just unplug the usb and replug it, turn it off a few times and it should be ok. Turn off the mouse every time you’re not using it when it’s plugged in. Got mine to work again, and the mouse is very comfy and large for the price I would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well. Good price. Not ergonomic
reviews.reviewText: My old mouse was not scrolling properly and like a boiling frog I just got used to it as it got worse and worse. It was an Amazon mouse.This is relevant because when I ordered my new mouse I wanted one that was wider as I felt my hand was cramped in on the old mouse.New mouse arrives. Amazon brand. Nearly identical in shape to the old mouse. Not ergonomic at all. Unless they mean you can click the buttons.Bonus? rechargeable. No more batteries.Works great. Scrolling normally again. That was a big plus.Moving doesnt wake it. You have to click it which is fine. Nbd really.

O produto foi comprado devido a necessidade de um mouse maior, mais ergonômico. Para minha grata surpresa, as expectativas foram atendidas.A qualidade do produto em si é boa. O clique dos botões superiores é muito silencioso. Os laterais são menos, porém nada gritante.Não consegui zerar a bateria dele, ainda. Como não é possível ver o nível da bateria, estou testando carregá-lo em intervalos de tempo diferentes. Até o momento, consegui validar somente que dura, ao menos, um mês de uso diário superior a 8hrs.Após 3 meses de uso, posso afirmar que recomendo o produto. Não identifiquei nenhum ponto negativo até o momento.

I recently got a remote job and needed a mous. I haven't used a mous in years, they have come a long way! This one is wonderful, fits my hand well, is smooth to work with, and when charged it lasts a long time. the clicks are quiet indeed. would recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: 6 Meses de uso, y sigue excelente.
reviews.reviewText: Lo adquirí a un excelente precio, pensando que sería un Mouse cualquiera, y no fue así. La duración de la batería es casi interminable, la precisión y comodidad es buena y los materiales de construcción así como su diseño me pareció muy bueno. 10/10

reviews.reviewTitle: Este producto es muy práctico y silencioso
reviews.reviewText: Me gusto el producto ya que es muy útil y práctico no hace ruido
